constraint.desc: Text field that accepts all types of characters using some sort of escaping convention along with the ability to specify bolding, font size, color etc.
constraint.comments: Not sure if characterset for rich text is the same for regular text but just interpretted differently. I.e. html is plain text interpreted differently.
